评论概述: Feels like it should be over $100
评论详情: My daughter asked for this and I expected a cheap shirt but was so surprised it’s a great heavy weight y shirt very over sized but so cute

I was apprehensive purchasing this shirt, despite wanting it for a few months, due to the largest size being an XL. Typically I fit an XL in more fitted tops but go for XXL or 2XL when I want a looser or more relaxed fit in. Reading the reviews, the shirt is a thick material with some structure, and tops like that tend to not have much stretch. With this shirt, all of that is true. However, when they say “oversized” they actually mean it. This shirt (ordered in an XL) fits more like an XXL or a smaller 2XL, and because of that, I definitely think you can purchase this shirt if you wear a size/size and a half bigger than the biggest size (XL). The fit is a little strange, as others also have mentioned, because I believe the shirt is supposed to be “men’s sizing” but unisex. Where it fit me tighter was my stomach (apron belly) and my hips which are sort of wider as I have an hourglass shape, but baggy on my chest and arms. I think with some wear it will stretch a little more, but if you’re a bit heavier like me (~270lbs) just be wary! I’m about 5’5 and it’s also long, goes to about my crotch, and if you’re shorter you could wear it as a dress! Don’t mind the length because I’m going to tuck it/crop it. Super thick material, definitely not see through. Sleeves are a little on the long side and come down to my elbow. All in all a very high quality garment, so I feel the $40 price point is justified. Look out for coupons- I was able to apply a 10% or 15% off coupon! My first purchase from the brand and it won’t be the last. I hope Aelfric Eden expands their size range to at least a 3XL to be more size inclusive!

I have learned through trial and error (and many returns later lol) that most oversized shirts run 1-2 sizes larger. So, now when ordering any oversized tops, I will size down one size (I usually wear a 2x / XXL and I ordered an XL).  On my body, the XL still fits like a 3x or a very baggy 2x, so if I ordered my regular size, it would have definitely been way too big. I plan on ordering another shirt from this company but in a large this time and it should fit perfectly.  The shirt is thick and good quality but try to wait for sales to save a little money!

评论概述: It’s giving vintage inspired print not vintage Tee
评论详情: I did not keep this product and returned just because I didn’t like the way it wore on ME. Sizing was as expected it just wasn’t right for my body.  Secondly, the photo in the listing looks pre-washed or pre-worn the black and even the print is a bit faded and not so vibrant. The Tshirt and print seemed like freshly printed and in mint condition. You would have to wash it several times on its own to achieve the look in the photo and not damage other garments. It’s like nobody wants to rip the holes in the jeans themselves so they pay for them to be done already- that same philosophy holds for vintage tees, especially ones over $35.
